list.name: JS Calculator
description: Commonly used algorithms and data structure operations in several languages. The most commonly used algorithms for sorting and searching are covered.

list.name: Flames 2K22
description: A website designed to provide live updates on a sports event held at lbs college of engineering in 2022. Data was entered into Google Sheets and reflected on the website using the Sheets API.
It was useful to know the most recent reliable score and departmental scoreboard position during the event.

list.name: Movie Loft
description: Movie Loft is a simple to use web-based movie database client. It could be useful when looking for movies and television shows. It also contains detailed information on a film or television show, such as the cast and crew, number of episodes, and so on.
Notably, it was a beginner-friendly project for learning open APIs and api integeration.

list.name: React Todo
description: Simple React Todo app with a simple design. It can obviously add, list, checkmark, and delete your tasks, but it does so in a simple manner.This is my first React project.

list.name: Drum Kit
description: Interactive drum kit simulation; a simple and easy-to-create yet fun project to work on.
One of my fave vanilla js projects as a beginner.

list.name: DSA
description: A website designed to provide live updates on a sporting event performed at lbs college of engineering in 2022. Data was entered into Google Sheets and reflected on the website using the Sheets API.
It was useful to know the most recent reliable score and departmental scoreboard position during the event.
